item.title: DCM Financial Services Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Weak Fundamentals
item.description: Shares of DCM Financial Services Ltd have declined to a fresh 52-week low, reflecting ongoing pressures on the company’s financial health and market performance. The stock closed at ₹5.98, marking a significant drop from its 52-week high of ₹9.21 and underscoring a challenging period for the non-banking financial company (NBFC). Time: 7 minutes ago
